info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF STEUBEN...OTSEGO... CHEMUNG...CHENANGO...CORTLAND...MADISON...SCHUYLER...TIOGA... BROOME...AND TOMPKINS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 240 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Brookfield to near Taylor to near Ithaca to near Hornby and moving southeast at 25 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Ithaca, Elmira, Cortland, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Norwich, Horseheads, Newfield and Hamilton. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 8 and 12. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 48 and 59. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
